You may put a creature that costs 3 or less from the top of your deck or your hand into the battle zone.) ■ Whenever you put a creature into the battle zone, look at the top 2 cards of your deck and put one of them on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMEX-14 Magnificent War x Ten Kings Super Final Wars!!!

property.name: Race
property.value: Metallica/Team Ginga

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GALAXYSHIELD} {W2} (You may pay Water 2 instead of the cost of using this card. If you do, put this card into your shields face up.) ■ At the start of your turn, if this creature is face up in your shields, summon it with its cost paid. {GALAXY GO} ■ At the start of your turn, if this card is face up in your shields, summon it with its cost paid. ■ When you put this creature face up into your shield zone, choose a creature that costs 2 or less and return it to its owner's hand. During your opponent's next turn, your opponent can't summon creatures that cost 2 or less.

property.name: Rules

Choose any number of your opponent's creatures that have total cost the same as or less than the discarded card and return them to their owner's hand.

property.name: Rules

If you do, each of your creatures gets "blocker" until the start of your next turn. (You may tap a creature that has "blocker" to change your opponent's attack target to that creature.)

Then put one of your shields into your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger".

property.value: D2 Field

property.name: Race

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kirifudash (At the end of any of your creature's attacks, if that creature breaks a shield while attacking, you may pay to expand this D2 Field.) ■ Whenever any of your creatures become blocked, that creature breaks one of your opponent's shields. ■ Your creature's can't be tapped due to the effects of your opponent's spells or a creature's ability. ■ Whenever any of your creatures would put into the battle zone tapped, they are put in untapped instead. (Whenever another D2 Field is put into the battle zone, put this D2 Field into your graveyard.)
